overview:
Work: Eran was a co-founder and the VP R&D of ICQ, the world’s first Instant Messenger, which was acquired by AOL for $407M in 1998. After holding a VP position in AOL, Eran started several other Internet startups before co-founding Kaltura on September of 2006.

Fun: Eran spends most of his spare time with his wife and four kids. He is addicted to Skittles and Toggi Wafers, and he loves watching movies and programming.
